attributes.action: free Scotland from the rule of Westminster
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are our own people with different views and values to the English. We demand the right to run our country the way we see fit and to decide where all public funding is spent esp. healthcare, defence, energy, pollution, transport, education.....

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
